code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Item from'./Item';import{Card,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ItemsContainer=_ref=>{let{items,isOwner,onItemUpdate,onItemDelete}=_ref;const[showResolved,setShowResolved]=useState(false);const filteredItems=showResolved?items:items.filter(item=>!item.resolved);const resolvedCount=items.filter(item=>item.resolved).length;const handleToggleResolved=itemId=>{const item=items.find(i=>i.id===itemId);if(item){onItemUpdate(itemId,{resolved:!item.resolved});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"items-container mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{children:["Items (",filteredItems.length,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{variant:showResolved?"primary":"outline-primary",size:"sm",onClick:()=>setShowResolved(!showResolved),children:[showResolved?'ðŸ“‹ Hide Resolved':'ðŸ“‹ Show Resolved',resolvedCount>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge bg-secondary ms-1",children:resolvedCount})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{children:filteredItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center p-5 text-muted",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h6",{children:["No items ",showResolved?'in this list':'to buy']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-0",children:showResolved?'No completed items yet':'Add some items to your shopping list'})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list-group list-group-flush",children:filteredItems.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Item,{id:item.id,name:item.name,quantity:item.quantity,resolved:item.resolved,isOwner:isOwner,index:index,onToggleResolved:handleToggleResolved,onDelete:onItemDelete},item.id))})})]});};export default ItemsContainer;
